attributes.action: eliminate excess plastic packaging and carrier bags in favour of biodegradable packaging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is insane the amount of waste we produce thanks to ridiculous excess plastic wrappers on everything we buy.. plastic bag inside plastic bag inside cardboard sleeve inside a carrier bag to just be thrown in the bin and into a landfill, never to be used again, only to pollute our already suffering world. I can guarantee most households have bags full of bags not being used which slowly add up each time they go to the supermarket; some shoppers like to have a bag from a trendy shop as a souvenir of what expensive item they've bought, it's a waste! It seems only SANE and obvious to quickly create an alternative, a biodegradable environmentally friendly replacement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
